SCTX:
Begin lugrubScript

short doOnce
short NoLore
float timer

if ( CellChanged == 1 )
	Set doOnce to 0
	Set timer to 0
	Return
endif

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	;don't increment timer in menu mode...
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex IL_GnisisBlight >= 10 )
	;if you *don't* kill lugrub in last quest, it is now "safe" to be here
	;you get one free stopcombat
	if ( doOnce != -1 )
		Set doOnce to -1
		StopCombat
	endif
	Return
endif

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	if ( GetDistance Player < 400 )
		Set doOnce to 1
		ForceGreeting
		Set timer to 0
	endif
endif

if ( doOnce == 1 )
	Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	if ( timer > 10 )
		StartCombat Player
	endif
	Return
endif

End
